question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
give contact details for when you are away
give instructions about how to care for your pet
describe other household duties
text: Thank you so much for helping me out to take care of my dog while I`ll be in Greece for my vacation next month. It was very kind of you to accept my request.

I`m planning to leave Sri Lanka on 4th October and I`ll be back on 15th October. My cousin who lives in Greece already got me a sim card for me and while I`m there you will be able to contact me via this number. It`s +8134394424. In case you could not reach me, you can contact my cousin`s number at +81456822532.

As you already know, Mingo is a friendly dog and it hardly bites anyone. I have kept 5 kg of dog food so you can give them during the mornings. In the evening, a maid will come and prepare food for Mingo. Although she is preparing food, she is really scared of the dog so I guess you are the one who need to do that.

Another person will come to clean Mingo`s cage and  give him a wash and he will be there every Sunday. Since we don`t allow him or the maid to access my house alone, I guess you have to open the door for them. And it would be a great help if you can stay at my house while they are working.
Hope I was not asking too much  favours. Since you love Mingo and spend time with him, I`m sure you will have a great time.

error_list.error_des: The plural verb need does not appear to agree with the singular subject the one. Consider changing the verb form for subject-verb agreement.
It appears that the quantifier much does not fit with the countable noun favours. Consider changing the quantifier or the noun.
